fields.name: children
fields.desc: The toggle button widgets.

fields.name: isSelected
fields.desc: The corresponding selection state of each toggle button.

fields.name: onPressed
fields.desc: The callback that is called when a button is tapped.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.RawMaterialButton.mouseCursor}

fields.name: tapTargetSize
fields.desc: Configures the minimum size of the area within which the buttons may be pressed.

fields.name: textStyle
fields.desc: The [TextStyle] to apply to any text in these toggle buttons.

fields.name: constraints
fields.desc: Defines the button's size.

fields.name: color
fields.desc: The color for descendant [Text] and [Icon] widgets if the button is enabled and not selected.

fields.name: selectedColor
fields.desc: The color for descendant [Text] and [Icon] widgets if the button is selected.

fields.name: disabledColor
fields.desc: The color for descendant [Text] and [Icon] widgets if the button is disabled.

fields.name: fillColor
fields.desc: The fill color for selected toggle buttons.

fields.name: focusColor
fields.desc: The color to use for filling the button when the button has input focus.

fields.name: highlightColor
fields.desc: The highlight color for the button's [InkWell].

fields.name: splashColor
fields.desc: The splash color for the button's [InkWell].

fields.name: hoverColor
fields.desc: The color to use for filling the button when the button has a pointer hovering over it.

fields.name: focusNodes
fields.desc: The list of [FocusNode]s, corresponding to each toggle button.

fields.name: renderBorder
fields.desc: Whether or not to render a border around each toggle button.

fields.name: borderColor
fields.desc: The border color to display when the toggle button is enabled and not selected.

fields.name: selectedBorderColor
fields.desc: The border color to display when the toggle button is selected.

fields.name: disabledBorderColor
fields.desc: The border color to display when the toggle button is disabled.

fields.name: borderWidth
fields.desc: The width of the border surrounding each toggle button.

fields.name: borderRadius
fields.desc: The radii of the border's corners.

fields.name: direction
fields.desc: The direction along which the buttons are rendered.

fields.name: verticalDirection
fields.desc: If [direction] is [Axis.vertical], this parameter determines whether to lay out the buttons starting from the first or last child from top to bottom.

nodes.name: ToggleButtons Multiple Selection
desc: The logic of state transformation can be controlled to create different effects.
